definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Elderberry is usually taken as a liquid (like cough syrup) or a lozenge.
sentences.chinese: 接骨木提取物一般做成液體，如止咳糖漿，或是錠劑。

sentences.english: Objective To study effect of Sambucus willamsii Hance fruit oil on reduce plasma lipids.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究接骨木果油是否具有降血脂作用。

sentences.english: And in the event that you do fall ill, stock up on herbal remedies like ginseng and black elderberry.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你生病了，你可以使用人蔘和黑接骨木等中草藥。

sentences.english: No other elderberry brand can make the same claim.
sentences.chinese: 沒有其他黑接骨木品牌可以作出同樣的要求。

sentences.english: Black Elderberry Immune System Support Liquid, For Kids, Berry Flavored.
sentences.chinese: 黑接骨木增強免疫系統液，兒童，漿果味。

sentences.english: Only a few years ago, “nobody really knew what elderflower was, ” said Mr. Cooper, a third-generation distiller.
sentences.chinese: 就在幾年前，“人們都不知道接骨木花到底是什麼。

sentences.english: The fruit of the elderberry shrub has a long history of being used for colds and flu.
sentences.chinese: 接骨木的果實很早就被用來治療感冒和流感了。

sentences.english: The flowers are used mainly for making elderflower liqueur and soda.
sentences.chinese: 這些花通常是被用來製作接骨木莓花酒和蘇打。

sentences.english: A liqueur flavored with elderberry berries.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種接骨木槳果釀造的甜酒。

sentences.english: Into that add 3 tsp of dried elderberries and crush.
sentences.chinese: 接着再加入3茶匙的接骨木果乾一齊研碎。

sentences.english: Elderberry juice, tea or syrup are potent and can help knock out flu symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 接骨木果汁，茶或糖漿是防治流感症狀的有力飲品。
